text: The Parque das Nações (literally: Park of the Nations), is a freguesia (civil parish) of Lisbon, the capital of Portugal. It is located in eastern Lisbon, Parque das Nações is to the east of Olivais, north of Marvila, and south of Loures. In 2018, an estimated 31,000 people live in the area. ==References== Category:Lisbon
title: Parque das Nações
